table.name: vtiger_expense
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_expense` ( `expenseid` int NOT NULL, `expence_employeename` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expense_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expense_details` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expense_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expence_reimbursementdate` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expence_billstartdate` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expence_billenddate` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `expence_amount` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`expenseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_expensecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_expensecf` ( `expenseid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`expenseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
